products.name: Watch
products.description: a watch worn on a strap round the wrist.

products.name: Camera
products.description: A camera is an optical instrument used to record images. At their most basic, cameras are sealed boxes (the camera body) with a small hole (the aperture) that allow light in to capture an image on a light-sensitive surface (usually photographic film or a digital sensor).

products.name: Pen
products.description: an instrument for writing or drawing with ink, typically consisting of a metal nib or ball, or a nylon tip, fitted into a metal or plastic holder.

products.name: Car
products.description: a road vehicle, typically with four wheels, powered by an internal combustion engine and able to carry a small number of people

products.name: Bicycle
products.description: a vehicle consisting of two wheels held in a frame one behind the other, propelled by pedals and steered with handlebars attached to the front wheel

products.name: Bike
products.description: Harley-Davidson, Inc., H-D, or Harley, is an American motorcycle manufacturer founded in 1903 in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. Along with Indian it was one of two major American motorcycle manufacturers to survive the Great Depression.
